Interface INode

All Known Implementing Classes:
BitcoinNode, Node
public interface INode
Represents a network node.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static enum 
    INode.BehaviorType
    Enumeration for the behavior type of node.

  • Method Details

    • getID

      int getID()
      Returns the ID of the node.
      Returns:
      The ID of the node.

    • getStructure

      IStructure getStructure()
      Returns the structure (blockchain, DAG, etc.) associated with the node.
      Returns:
      The structure associated with the node.

    • setHashPower

      void setHashPower(float hashpower)
      TODO: Conflicts with Sampler. Check to see what the hashpower is. Set the total hash power of the node in Gigahashes (billions of hashes) per second.
      Parameters:
      hashpower - The hash power in GH/second.

    • getHashPower

      float getHashPower()
      Returns the total hashpower of the node in Gigahashes (billions of hashes) per second.
      Returns:
      The hash power in GH/second.

    • setElectricityCost

      void setElectricityCost(float electricityCost)
      Sets the cost (in real world currency) of electricity in tokens/kWh (Kilowatt Hours)
      Parameters:
      electricityCost - The cost of electricity in tokens/kWh.

    • getElectricityCost

      float getElectricityCost()
      Get the cost (in conventional currency "tokens") of electricity in tokens/kWh (Kilowatt Hours)
      Returns:
      The cost of electricity in tokens/kWh.

    • getCostPerGH

      double getCostPerGH()
      Returns the cost in conventional currency tokens in tokens/GH. Calculation is as follows: [ [electrictiyCost ($/kWh) * electricPower (W) / 1000 (W/kW)] / [3600 (s/h) * hashPower (GH/s)]] = [ [electrictiyCost ($/kWh) * electricPowerinkW (kW)] / [3600 (s/h) * hashPower (GH/s)]] = [ [electrictiyCostPerHour ($/h)] / [hashesPerHour (GH/h)]] = Tokens per billions of hashes ($/GH)
      Returns:
      Cost in conventional currency tokens in tokens/GH.

    • getElectricPower

      float getElectricPower()
      Get the electric power of the node in Watts.
      Returns:
      The electric power of the node in Watts.

    • setElectricPower

      void setElectricPower(float power)
      Get the electric power of the node in Watts.
      Parameters:
      power - The electric power of the node in Watts.

    • getAverageConnectedness

      float getAverageConnectedness()
      Returns the average connectedness of the node; i.e., the average throughput with the other nodes.
      Returns:
      The average connectedness of the node.

    • getTotalCycles

      double getTotalCycles()
      Returns the total PoW cycles the node has expended TODO: Unit of measure?
      Returns:
      The total PoW cycles of the node has expended.

    • setSimulation

      void setSimulation(Simulation sim)
      Sets the Simulation object for the node.
      Parameters:
      sim - The Simulation object.

    • setBehavior

      void setBehavior(INode.BehaviorType h)
      Sets a behavior type of the node (HONEST, MALICIOUS etc.)
      Parameters:
      h - The behavior type.

    • getBehavior

      INode.BehaviorType getBehavior()
      Returns the behavior type of the node.
      Returns:
      The behavior type of the node.

    • timeAdvancementReport

      void timeAdvancementReport()
      Generates a time advancement report. The method is called from the simulator (or other) environment in for continues logging of events. The method is called every time a new even is processed. The content and format of the report may vary depending on the implementation. No parameters are required for this method.

    • periodicReport

      void periodicReport()
      Generates a generic time-advancement report. The method is called from the simulator (or other) environment in for periodic logging on events status etc. The content and format of the report may vary depending on the implementation. This method does not take any parameters.

    • beliefReport

      void beliefReport(long[] sample, long time)
      Generates a transaction belief report. The method is called from the simulator (or other) environment. In response the node must report whether it believes each of the transactions in its structure.
      Parameters:
      sample - A list of transaction IDs for which beliefs are to be reported.
      time - The time of the request.

    • nodeStatusReport

      void nodeStatusReport()
      Generates a node status report. The method is called from the simulator (or other) environment. In response the node must report it's status (e.g. whether it is active, how many tokens it has, how much power it has spend etc.)

    • structureReport

      void structureReport()
      Generates a structure report. The method is called from the simulator (or other) environment. In response the node must output the structure,

    • close

      void close(INode n)
      To be called when the node object is not closing though end of simulation or other termination condition.
      Parameters:
      n - The INode implementing object to close.

    • event_NodeReceivesClientTransaction

      void event_NodeReceivesClientTransaction(Transaction t, long time)
      Event: Node receives a client transaction.
      Parameters:
      t - The client transaction received by the node.
      time - The timestamp of the event.

    • event_NodeReceivesPropagatedTransaction

      void event_NodeReceivesPropagatedTransaction(Transaction trans, long time)
      Event: Node receives a propagated transaction.
      Parameters:
      trans - The propagated transaction received by the node.
      time - The timestamp of the event.

    • event_NodeReceivesPropagatedContainer

      void event_NodeReceivesPropagatedContainer(ITxContainer t)
      Event: Node receives a propagated container.
      Parameters:
      t - The propagated container received by the node.

    • event_NodeCompletesValidation

      void event_NodeCompletesValidation(ITxContainer t, long time)
      Event: Node completes validation of a container.
      Parameters:
      t - The container for which validation is completed.
      time - The timestamp of the event.

    • event_PrintPeriodicReport

      void event_PrintPeriodicReport(long time)
      Event: Node receives a request to print a periodic report
      Parameters:
      time - The timestamp of the event.

    • event_PrintBeliefReport

      void event_PrintBeliefReport(long[] sample, long time)
      Event: Node receives a request to print a belief report
      Parameters:
      sample - The transactions for which the belief report is to be produced.
      time - The timestamp of the event.

    • event_PrintStructureReport

      void event_PrintStructureReport(long time)
      Event: Node receives a request to print a structure
      Parameters:
      time - The timestamp of the event.

      Event: Node receives a request to print a self status report
      Parameters:
      time - The timestamp of the event.
